{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DWL-8620AP |revision=A1 |series=AC2600 |fcc_date=08/09/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=KA2WL8620APA1 |ic_id=4216A-WL8620APA1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8068;Q, IPQ8068, 1VV, FK715HJS, K071500; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4-IT:E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK646LGL, 1646, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5218;3Q, WRJA;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;RFMD;RFPA5542;PA5542, 011D;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, VHT80+80, LACP, Link Aggregation, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=10.90.90.91 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless AC2600 Wave2 4x4 MU-MIMO Dual Band Unified Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.dlinkmea.com/index.php/product/details?det=OTRzMzNta1FjSUV1c2JyS00zMXpLQT09}} (''D-Link Middle East & Africa'') The radio IDs are not legible in the FCC photos but both are assumed to be QCA9984. :Pads for a Mini PCIe socket are present but unpopulated in the FCC photos. The [[D-Link DWL-8620APE rev A1]] is internally identical but has four external antennas. :It later received its own FCC ID. ===See also=== *[[D-Link DWL-6620APS rev A1]] - AC1300 Wireless Access Point *[[D-Link DWL-7620AP rev A1]] - AC1300 Wireless Access Point *[[D-Link DWL-8620AP rev A1]] - AC2600 Wireless Access Point *[[D-Link DWL-8620APE rev A1]] - AC2600 Wireless Access Point __NOTOC__
